name: jwplayer-fandom

scripts.build: npm run copy-html && npm run build-all-css && npm run build-js
scripts.build-all-css: npm run build-css && npm run build-dev-css
scripts.build-css: node-sass src/styles/index.scss --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers="ie >= 11, Safari >= 7.1, last 2 versions" > dist/index.css
scripts.build-dev-css: node-sass src/styles/dev.scss --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers="ie >= 11, Safari >= 7.1, last 2 versions" > dist/dev.css
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel watch-other watch-js watch-scss server
